item.title: Korean Air provides a direct flight between Seoul and Houston
item.description:
Korean Air has launched new daily nonstop flights between George Bush Intercontinental Airport (IAH) in Houston and Incheon International Airport in Seoul. Source: Korean Air. The first 777-200 aircraft arrives in Houston on May 2. John Jackson, Korean Air’s Vice President of Passenger Marketing and Sales for the Americas, stated: “We see significant opportunities here and are both proud and excited to join Houston’s vibrant business community.” These nonstop flights will depart daily from Terminal D at George Bush Intercontinental Airport at 10:40 am CST, with return flights leaving Seoul at 9:10 am local time from Incheon International Airport...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/korean-air-provides-a-direct-flight-between-seoul-and-houston/
